item.title: Step-by-Step Workflow
item.description:
The Complete 7-Step Process

This page details the workflow you’ll follow in both exercises. Each step builds on the previous one, creating a complete pipeline from raw source data to analyzed entity resolution results.

STEP 1: Examine the Source Data

Goal: Understand the structure, format, and content of your source data

What you do:

  • View the source file (CSV, JSON, etc.)
  • Identify field names and data types
  • Note any special characteristics (nested structures, conditional fields, etc.)
  • Check data quality and completeness

Tools:

item.title: Tools Reference
item.description:
Quick Reference for Workshop Tools

This page provides quick command syntax for all tools used in the 7-step workflow. Bookmark this page for easy reference during the exercises.

Schema Generation

sz_schema_generator.py

Analyzes source data and generates detailed schema documentation.

Basic usage:

python3 workshop/senzing/tools/sz_schema_generator.py <input_file> -o <output_schema>.md

For CSV files:

python3 workshop/senzing/tools/sz_schema_generator.py data.csv -o schema.md

For JSON files:

python3 workshop/senzing/tools/sz_schema_generator.py data.jsonl -o schema.md

Output: Markdown file with field analysis, types, sample values, and population rates
